definition: roof of the mouth/to load (a gun)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Here is a laser pistol with one charge.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一把上膛的激光枪。

sentences.english: Doth not the ear try words? and the mouth taste his meat?
sentences.chinese: 耳朵岂不试验言语，正如上膛尝食物吗。

sentences.english: First its claws is copped like a pistol, then fired.
sentences.chinese: 首先它的螯像手枪一样“上膛“，然后开火。

sentences.english: I showed her how to break the barrel and put shells in.
sentences.chinese: 我向她演示如何打开枪管和装弹上膛。
我可是带着一件上膛的武器。

sentences.english: I would never, under any circumstances, have a loaded gun in the house if there were children there.
sentences.chinese: 我永远不会在有孩子的家里放上一把上膛的枪。

sentences.english: You're gonna to lose, There's a round in your chamber. I heard it.
sentences.chinese: 你会输的，子弹已经上膛了，我听得出来。

definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
to open fire/to shoot a gun
